content: these little knitted mittens are a cute way to decorate your tree for christmas this pattern is worked flat on single pointed needles to make it easier for beginner knitters but you could easily convert it to knitting in the round if you prefer the hanging loop is a single_crochet chain worked on a crochet hook designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz the mittens are knitted in acrylic dk yarns **needles** a pair of 4mm single pointed knitting needles us 6 **recommended yarn** sirdar hayfield bonus dk double knitting/light worsted weight 100% acrylic a few grammes in emerald green **notions** tapestry needle 4mm crochet hook and white yarn to embroider the star **sizes** one size only - the mitten is 9cm tall not including the hanging loop **techniques** for confident beginners and above other techniques used include casting on and off knits purls m1 increase and k2tog decrease and a little seaming to finish **pattern info** this knitting pattern is a pdf download 2 pages and written in english patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2015 amanda berry all rights reserved
